page.title: 12Methodist Church,Great Ayton
page.content: {The Methodist Church}is on the High Street opposite the river Leven.The minister is rev.Peter Bedford.There are 3 services a day on Sunday, Worship{(communion 1st Sun,Monthly)9am {Family worship & Junior church 10:30am {Evening Worship 6:30pm.}The service held at 10:30am has a creche and a Sunday school for 3 to 5's classes for 5 to 7 year old juniors and seniors. The church holds many events such as {Harvest,Christmas}and the church anniversary which is on the 30th of June this year.A lot of children go to church but they have to leave after the second hymn to go to the Sunday schools.The church is used for other {activities e.g. youth clubs and {coffee mornings}The young people go to youth clubs while the older people go to the coffee mornings.
